title: Falling For U
lyrics:
Han son-eneun keopileul deulgo ieopon hanjjog-eul kkobgo
Sonkkeut-eul seuchineun balam-eul geodneun
Byeolgeo anin chwimileul gat-i hal
Sisikolkolhan nal an-ajul
Geuleon salam-i

Eodienga issgil balassneunde yeogi issne



Mal-eul geolkka malkka hancham gomindeul-i mag

Meolis-sog-e jakku eongkyeo

Gat-i masilyeogo haessdeon keopineun beolsseo

Imi du janjjae biwo



I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U Once again

I’m Falling For U

Falling For U

Ppajyeonaogin neuj-eoss-eo



Nuwo issneun ge anj-a issneun ge johda saeng-gaghaessneunde

Neol bogo naseo nae saeng-gagdeul-i babogat-i neukkyeojyeo

Where Are U My Happiness

Nae haengbog jeonbu yeogi issne

Neol chaj-aseo neomu joh-a



Geuleon salam-i

Nae nun-ap-e nega natanassne

Yeogi issne



Mal-eul geolkka malkka hancham gomindeul-i mag

Meolis-sog-e jakku eongkyeo

Gat-i masilyeogo haessdeon keopineun beolsseo

Imi du janjjae biwo



I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U Once again

I’m Falling For U

Falling For U

Ppajyeonaogin neuj-eoss-eo



Gat-eun gos-eul bol ttaemyeon sonjab-eullae

Nun-i majuchil ttaemyeon kkwag an-eullae

Neolang hamkkehal sigan joh-eun saeng-gag-e

Gibun johge usgo issneun nae moseub-e



Mal-eul geolkka malkka hancham gomindeul-i mag

Meolis-sog-e jakku eongkyeo

Gat-i masilyeogo haessdeon keopineun beolsseo

Imi du janjjae biwo



I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U

I’m Falling For U Once again

I’m Falling For U

Falling For U

Ppajyeonaogin neuj-eoss-eo
